article.title: Intevec Photonics to Provide Electronic Image Intensifier Technology
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Intevac Photonics Incorporated, Santa Clara, California, was awarded a $10,100,000 firm-fixed-price contract for electronic image intensifier ship sets and spares. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
